tool_description: This API allows developer access to login, view cases, and submit Pardon/Punish votes in the League of Legends Tribunal.
name: League of Legends Tribunal
title: League of Legends Tribunal

api_list.name: Login Captcha
api_list.description: Retrieve a captcha image (and associated id) for user verification.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alikonda-league-of-legends-tribunal.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alikonda-league-of-legends-tribunal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alikonda-league-of-legends-tribunal.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alikonda-league-of-legends-tribunal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
